consent.title: Your Privacy Matters
consent.description: VisionCheck AI stores data locally on your device to save your test results and preferences. No data is sent to our servers.
consent.note: You can use the app without saving data. Your results will only be available during this session.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: VisionCheck AI is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect and how we use it.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: All data is stored locally on your device using your browser's localStorage. We do not have access to your data.

items.results: Test results (visual acuity, color vision, contrast sensitivity, etc.)

dataStorage.title: How Data is Stored
dataStorage.description: Your data is stored exclusively in your browser's localStorage on your device. We do not operate servers that store your personal data. Your data never leaves your device unless you choose to export or share it.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: If you use the AI Chat or Eye Photo Analysis features, your messages and photos are sent to OpenAI's API for processing. This requires an API key that you provide. We do not store or have access to your API key or the data sent to OpenAI.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have full control over your data:
rights.access: Access: View all stored data in the Data Settings page
rights.export: Export: Download all your data as a JSON file
rights.delete: Delete: Remove all stored data at any time
rights.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Revoke consent and switch to session-only mode

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For privacy-related questions, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using VisionCheck AI, you agree to these terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: VisionCheck AI is an educational eye health screening tool. It provides informal assessments to help you monitor your vision and decide when to consult an eye care professional.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: VisionCheck AI is NOT a medical device and does NOT provide medical diagnoses. The results are for educational and informational purposes only. They are not a substitute for professional eye examinations by a qualified optometrist or ophthalmologist.
disclaimer.warning: If you experience sudden vision changes, eye pain, flashes of light, or other concerning symptoms, seek immediate medical attention.

items.accuracy: Provide accurate information when using the tests
items.environment: Use the app in appropriate lighting and viewing conditions
items.professional: Consult an eye care professional for medical advice
items.apiKey: Keep your OpenAI API key confidential if using AI features

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: VisionCheck AI is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any decisions you make based on the screening results. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical concerns.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

dataSettings.title: Data & Privacy Settings
dataSettings.description: View, export, or delete your data stored in VisionCheck AI.

consent.title: Data Storage Consent
consent.granted: You have consented to data storage
consent.denied: You are using session-only mode (data not saved)

exportData.title: Export Your Data
exportData.description: Download all your data as a JSON file

deleteData.title: Delete All Data
deleteData.description: Permanently delete all your stored data
deleteData.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.
